```{r base_configuration}

```

```{r logging_configuration}
library(logging)
logFile <- "/data/brown22/conrad/pilot_log.txt"
pilot_log <- getLogger("pilot")
pilot_log$addHandler(writeToFile,file=logFile,level="DEBUG")
pilot_log$setLevel("DEBUG")
```
